column4: According to https://help.ubuntu.com/community/RestrictedFormats/WindowsCodecs, I can install the w32codecs package from debian-multimedia. Is this a fairly standard practice for y'all?
After my upgrade from breezy to dapper, my printer isn't working.  Printed files just sit in the queue.
remove the printer and reinstall it... I had the same problem and that fixed it right away.
